adDetails: *** Home Mortgages Done the Expert Way!! *** We have been successfully been making home loans for the last 15 years.  We specialize in personal service and making your loan experience a good one! We currently have the following     Foreign national financing for buying US homes.   FHA Financing for first time homebuyers and for refinancing.   HARP 2.0 loans for borrowers who have underwater mortgages.   Conventional and portfolio financing, even for Jumbo loan amounts.   Home Equity Lines of Credit.   Great rates!!! We are professional and will give you a 'no-BS' answer on your loan.  We have the programs and rates to make your loan happen.  Call us today to go over your personal loan scenario! Call show contact info ask for Dan. Or go to: janusmortgage.net NMLS ID: 340961 DRE License: 01078456
